Articles.Content: Since we now have a menu that tells us them, I was playing around with the kerbals' stats (their Stupidity and Courage), using the Crew Manifest mod. I believe the higher the Stupidity is on a kerbal, the more he will enjoy the flight. However, I'm not quite sure what Courage does. Does anyone know this?
It adjusts how badly or quickly something can fly before he begins frowning.
I think the reason that the kerbals "Stupidity" makes them enjoy the flight more is because well, just look at their rockets.

I believe that a Kerbal with max stupidity and max courage will always be happy, because stupidity is probably how oblivious they are to explosions and G forces. Lower stupidity will make them more aware, and lower courage will make them more likely to be scared.

Just my guess.
